<blockquote><p>
  Keep your crayons sharp, your sticky tape untangled and always put the tops back on your markers.
</p></blockquote>
<p><a href="http://www.cbc.ca/75/2011/10/ernie-coombs-keep-your-crayons-sharp.html">Memorial on CBC.ca</a></p>
